CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS( Commercial_Contract_Status__c , 'Green') , IMAGE( '/resource/CommercialContractStatusGREEN', ' Green' , 20, 44), IF(CONTAINS( Commercial_Contract_Status__c , 'Amber') , IMAGE( '/resource/CommercialContractStatusAMBER', ' Amber' , 20, 44), IF(CONTAINS( Commercial_Contract_Status__c , 'Red') , IMAGE( '/resource/CommercialContractStatusRED', ' Red' , 20, 44), null) ) )
CustomField.label: Commercial Contract Status (Formula)
